titles.title: Startup in a Day Act of 2019

To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to establish a competitive grant program to award grants to States and local governments for purposes of assisting entrepreneurs planning to start a small business concern.
Startup in a Day Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Startup in a Day Act of 2019
This bill requires the Small Business Administration to establish the Startup in a Day Program to assist entrepreneurs planning to start a small business in complying with state and local government requirements.
Specifically, the program awards competitive grants to state or local governments, which they may use to (1) develop, implement, and improve internet resources related to the small business concern startup process; and (2) assist entrepreneurs in registering and applying for any required licenses or permits.
